<h3>List Changes</h3>

<pre class="source" data-lang="bash">
git status
</pre>

<h4>Diff</h4>

<pre class="source" data-lang="bash">
git diff
</pre>

<h3>Remotes</h3>

<pre class="source" data-lang="bash">
git remote -v
</pre>

<h4>Pull</h4>

<p>
  If changes were made remotely, run git pull to merge them to the local working copy.
</p>

<pre class="source" data-lang="bash">
git pull
</pre>
